channel.title: CVE Feed for luckyshot -- CRMx
channel.description: The latest CVEs for luckyshot -- CRMx

item.title: CVE-2022-4592|2024-08-03T01:41:45.678Z -- luckyshot -- crmx
item.description: A vulnerability was found in luckyshot CRMx and classified as critical. This issue affects the function get/save/delete/comment/commentdelete of the file index.php. The manipulation leads to sql injection. The attack may be initiated remotely. The name of the patch is 8c62d274986137d6a1d06958a6f75c3553f45f8f. It is recommended to apply a patch to fix this issue. The identifier VDB-216185 was assigned to this vulnerability.
